Defines the type of block node such as paragraph, table, and alike.
properties.name: type

properties.description: Defines the version of ADF used in this representation.
properties.name: version

properties.description: An array containing inline and block nodes that define the content of a section of the document.
properties.name: content

properties.description: The account ID of the user, which uniquely identifies the user across all Atlassian products.
properties.name: accountId

properties.description: The type of account represented by this user. This will be one of 'atlassian' (normal users), 'app' (application user) or 'customer' (Jira Service Desk customer user)
properties.name: accountType

properties.description: The email address of the user. Depending on the users privacy settings, this may be returned as null.
properties.name: emailAddress

properties.description: The display name of the user. Depending on the users privacy settings, this may return an alternative value.
properties.name: displayName

properties.description: The time zone specified in the user's profile. Depending on the users privacy settings, this may be returned as null.
properties.name: timezone

properties.description: The date and time at which the comment was created.
properties.name: created

properties.description: The date and time at which the comment was updated last.
properties.name: updated
